title: Chocolate Guinness速 cake with chocolate Guinness速 glaze
ingredients: ['250ml Guinness速', '250g butter', '100g dark chocolate, broken into pieces', '400g caster sugar', '115ml soured cream or creme fraiche', '2 eggs, medium', '275g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', 'For the chocolate glaze', '115g butter', '125 g dark chocolate, broken into pieces', '75ml Guinness速', '115g cream cheese, at room temperature', '40g cocoa', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '500-550g icing sugar, sifted']
